about_the_game:
In the Eternal Night Kingdom ruled by the mad Divine Sovereignty, the Sunset Empire—a land shrouded in darkness since the day the Eternal Night began—there arose those who could not die. People saw this as a curse from the shadows. The Undying have an instinctive hunger for souls, and as a result, the other races often keep their distance from them.

But there is a glimmer of hope: among the endless darkness, the Undying possess shards of the Sunset's Divine Weapon, which serve as a conduit to link themselves to others—a faint light in this all-encompassing night.

Yet, in the deepest of tombs, someone has awakened an Undying long forgotten, whose name has been lost to time.

"…Sorry."

"…Please, help us find our way."

Game Features:

-1.Dark world setting

-2.Cycle of life and death

-3.Rich content with various possibilities

-4.Experience the stories of diverse characters

-5.Feel the sense of accomplishment from overcoming challenges

-6.Single-player gameplay

Currently, the game does not have an English version, but one may be added in the future depending on the circumstances.

In any case, we wish you an enjoyable gaming experience. Please enjoy the battles under the Eternal Night.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains descriptions of minors encountering danger, as well as elements that may be unsettling, such as blood, corpses, and depictions of minor violence.

Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×768 or better Display

short_description: The game features an ATB (Active Time Battle) combat system with a variety of skill combinations. You can adjust the difficulty to your preference at any time during the game. The game includes multiple NPCs. You can also choose to kill everyone and venture through the world completely alone.
